headline.print_headline: Lawyer: No Evidence Tied to Drunken Driver's Death
headline.main: Lawyer: No Evidence Tied to Drunken Driver's Death

lead_paragraph: The attorney for a Texas father accused of fatally shooting a drunken driver who caused an accident that killed his two sons argued with investigators Monday that none of the evidence they have presented at trial directly links his client to the murder.
